lead_paragraph: The Republican nominee’s new fund-raising numbers suggest he has tapped into the passion of his core supporters and may now have the resources to compete with Hillary Clinton.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and NICK CORASANITI

headline.print_headline: Small Donations Help Trump Cut Fund-Raising Gap
headline.main: Fueled by Small Donations, Donald Trump Makes Up Major Financial Ground

snippet: The Republican nominee’s new fund-raising numbers suggest he has tapped into the passion of his core supporters and may now have the resources to compete with Hillary Clinton....
abstract: Donald Trump's presidential campaign releases fund-raising figures that reveal he and Republican National Committee raised $82 million in July, mostly from small donations; figures indicate Trump has essentially closed gap between his fund-raising efforts and those of his rival Hillary Clinton, and that he will possess resources to compete effectively.
